original_title: Threshers: Sharks vs. Yaks, Melee in Malibu
overview: This action-packed film follows a group of brave fishermen who head out into the sparkling Malibu waters to do battle with 200-pound thresher sharks from small ocean kayaks. Beginning with a double hook-up, the insanity ensues as an angler gets hooked in the chin, a thresher jumps 15 feet in the air and sharks are pulled out of the depths onto the yaks. Donâ€™t miss this adrenaline-fueled journey.
title: Threshers: Sharks vs. Yaks, Melee in Malibu
